meanings.sent1: The nonsuccess of the project was disappointing.
meanings.sent2: Her constant nonsuccess in finding a job was disheartening.
meanings.sent3: The nonsuccess of the magician's disappearing act left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The nonsuccess of the seed to sprout was like a dream unfulfilled.
meanings.sent5: The nonsuccess of the rescue mission haunted him for years.

meanings.definition: Failure to achieve a desired outcome
meanings.sent1: The nonsuccess of the experiment was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: His repeated nonsuccess in winning the lottery didn't deter his hope.
meanings.sent3: The nonsuccess of the cake to rise properly made it look like a pancake.
meanings.sent4: The nonsuccess of the negotiation was a bitter pill to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The nonsuccess of the plan was a heavy weight on his shoulders.
